dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: That's a really strong statement from the president at the APK session—equal opportunities for all, no discrimination.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: That's a really strong statement from the president at the A P K session-equal opportunities for all, no discrimination.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The Head of State emphasized that all citizens in Kazakhstan are provided with equal opportunities. There has never been discrimination in Kazakhstan based on ethnicity, language, or religion.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, and he mentioned that unity and peace are foundational values for the country. It's like, uh, a core part of their state policy.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, and he mentioned that unity and peace are foundational values for the country. It's like, uh, a core part of their state policy.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: I would like to reiterate: unity and peace are among our foundational values. This is a fundamental principle of state policy, and we will continue to uphold it.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Right, and he called it a "model of social harmony"—almost like an international brand for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Right, and he called it a model of social harmony-almost like an international brand for Kazakhstan.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, we have built a model of social harmony that has become our unique achievement and an international brand, Tokayev continued.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Mhm, and I noticed he used that phrase, "we are different, but we are equal." That's such a clear guiding principle.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Mhm, and I noticed he used that phrase, we are different, but we are equal. That's such a clear guiding principle.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: At the heart of our interethnic relations and national unity lies the unshakable principle: ˜we are different, but we are equal.'

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: It's interesting how he tied it to not imitating others, you know? Like, they developed their own approach to interethnic relations.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It's interesting how he tied it to not imitating others, you know? Like, they developed their own approach to interethnic relations.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We never tried to imitate anyone or look back at others. At the same time, we successfully applied advanced approaches in interethnic relations and kept pace with the times.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: And this is the 30th session of the APK, right? Which is, um, a consultative body representing all ethnic groups.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And this is the thirtieth session of the A P K, right? Which is, um, a consultative body representing all ethnic groups.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: Speaking at the 34th session of the Assembly of the People of Kazakhstan (APK), President Kassym-Jomart Tokayev outlined the country's core values. This year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: Exactly—Deputy Chairman Dmitry Ostankovich called it a key platform for bringing people together around shared values.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Exactly-Deputy Chairman Dmitry Ostankovich called it a key platform for bringing people together around shared values.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The APK is a key public platform that brings together people of different nationalities, cultures, and traditions around shared Kazakhstani values, said Deputy Chairman of the APK Dmitry Ostankovich earlier.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: You know, it's rare to hear a leader so explicitly reject populist decisions in favor of, like, real situational policies.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: You know, it's rare to hear a leader so explicitly reject populist decisions in favor of, like, real situational policies.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: We avoid rushed, populist decisions and always base our policies on the real situation.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: For sure. And he stressed the state language as a language of interethnic communication—that's a delicate balance to maintain.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: For sure. And he stressed the state language as a language of interethnic communication-that's a delicate balance to maintain.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: This especially applies to affirming the status of the state language as a language of interethnic communication, he added.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: It sounds like they're really proud of what they've built over these 30 years. Like, a unique achievement, as Tokayev said.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: It sounds like they're really proud of what they've built over these thirty years. Like, a unique achievement, as Tokayev said.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: As a result, we have built a model of social harmony that has become our unique achievement and an international brand, Tokayev continued. This year marks the 30th anniversary of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostA
dialogue_turns.text: And the fact that the president chairs the assembly himself—that shows how high a priority it is for the government.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: And the fact that the president chairs the assembly himself-that shows how high a priority it is for the government.
dialogue_turns.evidence_snippet: The President of Kazakhstan serves as the Chair of the APK.

dialogue_turns.speaker: HostB
dialogue_turns.text: Yeah, it does make you think about how other multiethnic societies could, uh, learn from this model.
dialogue_turns.tts_text: Yeah, it does make you think about how other multiethnic societies could, uh, learn from this model.
